name: Usurp (Lio Lim)
description:
The crown is yours. Prove yourself. Usurp the throne.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Space to jump, hold X to attack, C to dash⚠️ Click on "prove yourself" to begin!

Made in 2 weeks 1 day for GDKO 2023 - Round 3
Theme: Create a Boss Fight.

My best run: hitless - 1:09:968
